basic.floral_language:
Serissa foetida
Floriography: sensibility, innocent, joyful
Serissa foetida is a woody plants flowering in summer. Leathery, oval leaves, funnel-shaped, snow white or slightly pale pink flowers with short hairs among petals. Can be used for miniature bonsai in living rooms, on desks, etc., adding some exquisite.
Serissa japonica favors a shaded environment, should avoid direct strong sunlight. Flowering from May to July for 2-3 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color light red or white

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes weak shade environments, avoid direct strong light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
